import React, { useState } from 'react' import { EDIT_AUTHOR, ALL_AUTHORS } from '../queries' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/client' import Select from 'react-select' const Authors = ({ show, authors }) => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [setBornTo, setSetBornTo] = useState('') const [ editAuthor ] = useMutation(EDIT_AUTHOR,{ refetchQueries: [ { query: ALL_AUTHORS} ] }) const authorNames = authors.map(a=> a.name) if (!show) { return null } const submit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log('name', name, 'birth', typeof(birthYear)) editAuthor({ variables: { name, setBornTo } }) console.log('editing author..') setName('') setSetBornTo('') } return (

authors
